1.Detail: This folder contains monthly utilization dashboard screenshots attached in an .dox file format.

2.Detail: This folder contains the monthly RRF (Resource Request Form) documents for resource allocation and management.

3.Detail: This folder contains the details of the each account such as count of employees, project details, allocation status, etc.

1.Detail: This Sheet has all the details of the associates in each account .

4.Detail: This folder contains the details of bench employees including their skills, experience, and availability for new projects.

5.Detail: This folder contains the allocation details of Graduate Trainee (GT) resources across various projects and accounts.

1.Detail: This Sheet has all the details of the GT's Allocation.

2.Detail: This Sheet has the count of GTs allocated to each account.

6.Detail: This folder contains the certification details of employees, including types of certifications, dates obtained, and certificate codes, etc.
